pageContext.description: Dimensions: EL 87.5; EWe 27.2; Wbt 10.0; MT 4.0; Wt 33.2; Tbt 1.0, Typology: No sign of flanges or stop bevel; approx. plano-convex in long section but flatter face undulates a little; sides flat., Manufacture: no defined edge bev. survives., Condition: none of edge extant - one point prob. very close.
pageContext.surface: mostly browny green with low irregularities; mini-pocking to brighter green
pageContext.collection: Walters, Mr. Duncan J. - (private 1990), 41 Stanley Road, Mansfield, Notts NG18 5AA
pageContext.site: Nottinghamshire, nr. Mansfield, found recently (Nov. 1990) amongst soil and rubble removed by mechanical excavators during the conversion of an area of disused farmland -> industrial estate.
pageContext.remarks: DF: S, Rec. SN Jan 1991., Source: Sb. A.
